channel.title: Crafted
channel.description: Discover quality crafted beer, coffee and food in your city - that just so happens to be suitable for vegans too!

item.title: Discover: Out of the Woods
item.description: Hang a right as you emerge from the new Leeds train station exit and you may stumble across this indoor woodland at Granary Wharf. Good coffee, waterfront views and friendly staff will keep you company here. Outdoor seating is available during the warmer months. They have a sister shop over
item.dc:creator: Crafted team
item.content:encoded:
Hang a right as you emerge from the new Leeds train station exit and you may stumble across this indoor woodland at Granary Wharf. Good coffee, waterfront views and friendly staff will keep you company here. Outdoor seating is available during the warmer months. They have a sister shop over on Water Lane.

Where: Granary Wharf, Watermans Place, Leeds, LS1 4GL

House Blend: Dark Woods Espresso

WiFi: Free - open

Soya: Yes - no extra charge (though this will change soon apparently üôÅ)

Website - outofthewoods.me.uk | Twitter - @outofthewoodsuk | Instagram - @outofthewoodsuk | Facebook - Out of the Woods

item.title: Crafted favourites in Leeds, West Yorkshire
item.description: A curated list of the best beer, coffee and pizza places in Leeds including Northern Monk Refectory, Laynes Espresso, Ecco Pizzeria & more
item.dc:creator: Crafted team
item.content:encoded:
A curated list of the best beer, coffee and pizza places in Leeds.

This is a living list that we will continue to update. Think we've missed something? Recommend a place.

Beer

13 places including Northern Monk Refectory, Bundobust, Friends of Ham, Tapped, North Bar & more

View list

Coffee

6 places including Laynes Espresso, Out Of The Woods, Mrs Athas, Moments Coffee, La Bottega Milanese & more

View list

Pizza

7 places including Ecco Pizzeria, Trattoria Il Forna, Candlebar, Tapped, Black Swan & more

View list

Last updated 30 March 16 @ 09:20
